Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class PublicKey

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.Key
uk.msci.project.rsa.PublicKey
public class PublicKey extends Key
This class represents the public key derived from an RSA key pair.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class uk.msci.project.rsa.Key

    exponent, keyValue, modulus

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PublicKey(File keyFile)
    Constructs a public key by first importing the key from a file and then parsing resulting string.
    PublicKey(String key)
    Constructs public key by parsing a string representation (comma delimited modulus and exponent) of the key.
    PublicKey(BigInteger N, BigInteger e)
    Constructs a public key with the given modulus and exponent.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class uk.msci.project.rsa.Key

  • Constructor Details

    • PublicKey

      public PublicKey(String key)
      Constructs public key by parsing a string representation (comma delimited modulus and exponent) of the key. This constructor delegates the parsing to the superclass constructor.
      Parameters:
      key - The string representation of the public key.

    • PublicKey

      public PublicKey(BigInteger N, BigInteger e)
      Constructs a public key with the given modulus and exponent.
      Parameters:
      N - The modulus part of the public key.
      e - The exponent part of the public key.

    • PublicKey

      public PublicKey(File keyFile) throws IOException
      Constructs a public key by first importing the key from a file and then parsing resulting string. This constructor delegates the file reading and parsing to the superclass constructor.
      Parameters:
      keyFile - The file from which to read the public key.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the key file.
